verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh I’ve heard a thousand stories Of what they think You’re like But I’ve heard the tender whispers Of love in the dead of night And You tell me that You’re pleased And that I’m never alone{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’re a good good Father It’s who You are, it’s who You are, it’s who You are And I’m loved by You It’s who I am, it’s who I am, it’s who I am{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I’ve seen many searching for Answers far and wide But I know we’re all searching For answers only You provide ‘Cause You know just what we need Before we say a word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’re a good good Father It’s who You are, it’s who You are, it’s who You are And I’m loved by You It’s who I am, it’s who I am, it’s who I am{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It’s love so undeniable I can hardly speak Peace so unexplainable I can hardly think As You call me deeper still As You call me deeper still As You call me deeper still Into love, love, love{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You’re a good good Father It’s who You are, it’s who You are, it’s who You are And I’m loved by You It’s who I am, it’s who I am, it’s who I am{/lang-eng}
